thread.title: Account Executive - Sports Media

title: Account Executive - Sports Media
text: Make Your Passion Your Career. â„¢ Work In Sports. Region Map Here is the job that interests you: Account Executive Posted/Updated: 10-02-2015 Brief Job Description: The Digital Sales Account Executive (AE) will responsible for revenue growth for all HTS digital offerings, through sales to agencies and clients directly.   Since your site launched in 2000, WorkInSports.com has been the go to place for USA Baseball when we are looking to fill full-time openings and internships. Your reputation throughout the sports industry as a vital tool for job seekers and employers is well deserved. Thanks again! David Perkins
